name: com.ayutaz.upiper
description: Text-to-Speech plugin for Unity using Piper-Plus TTS engine. Supports Japanese and English with high-quality neural voice synthesis.

samples.description: A simple demo scene showing how to use uPiper for text-to-speech synthesis with Japanese and English text.
NAIST Japanese Dictionary for OpenJTalk (103MB). Required for Japanese text-to-speech functionality.
CMU Pronouncing Dictionary for English phonemization (3.5MB). Required for English text-to-speech functionality.
Pre-trained ONNX voice models for Japanese and English (127MB). Can be downloaded separately if needed.
